ul.li: SpinalCordAssessmentQuestion is a kind of AssessmentSection

section.title: Description
section.p: This Class contains information that is pertinent to Assessment grouping or Section on the Assessment tool.
This Class contains information that is pertinent to Assessment grouping or Section on the Assessment tool.

stentry.p: assessmentSection : Code (1..1)

Contains the code set that identifies the section with in the Assessment form. SWLS , ASIA, FIN,FAM,CHARTSF etc. Contains the code set that identifies the section with in the Assessment form. SWLS Occupation and Education, Social, Attendant Care and Chart sf subscale.
bmi : Integer (1..1)
Contains the body Mass index score Contains the body Mass index score
interruptReturnDate : PointInTime (1..1)
Contains the Returns date/s after attendant care is interrupted for the veteran Contains the Returns date/s after attendant care is interrupted for the veteran
interruptTransferDate : PointInTime (1..*)
Contains the date/s when attendant care is interrupted for the veteran Contains the date/s when attendant care is interrupted for the veteran
motorScoreLeft : Integer (1..1)
Contains total leftside score of Motor ASIA assessment for the veteran Contains total leftside score of Motor ASIA assessment for the veteran
motorScoreRight : Integer (1..1)
Contains total right side score of Motor ASIA assessment for the veteran Contains total right side score of Motor ASIA assessment for the veteran
score : Integer (0..1)
Contains the weight for a particular assessment question in the sections Score for the section.
sensoryLtScoreLeft : Integer (1..1)
Contains total left side score of Light Touch ASIA assessment for the veteran Contains total left side score of Motor ASIA assessment for the veteran
sensoryLtScoreRight : Integer (1..1)
Contains total right side score of Light Touch ASIA assessment for the veteran Contains total right side score of Motor ASIA assessment for the veteran
sensoryPPScoreLeft : Integer (1..1)
Contains total left side score of pin prick ASIA assessment for the veteran Contains total left side score of pin prick ASIA assessment for the veteran
sensoryPPScoreRight : Integer (1..1)
Contains total right side score of pin prick ASIA assessment for the veteran Contains total right side score of pin prick ASIA assessment for the veteran
weight : Integer (0..1)
Contains the weight for a particular assessment question in the sections Contains the weight for a particular assessment question in the sections
